item.title: [cmr] Elvish Dreadlord
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Elf

Deathtouch

Whenever Elvish Dreadlord dies, non-Elf creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn.

Encore {5}{B}{B} ({5}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [cmr] Victimize
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.

https://twitter.com/Brttnymchlle/status/1322761670821703683

item.title: [cmr] Temur Battle Rage
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

Ferocious — That creature also gains trample until end of turn if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

item.title: [cmr] Flamekin Herald
item.description:
Creature — Elemental Wizard

Commander spells you cast have cascade. (Whenever you cast your commander, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with lesser converted mana cost. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

https://www.giga.de/artikel/magic-the-gathering-drei-exklusive-preview-karten-zu-commander-legends/

item.title: [cmr] Hellkite Courser
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Hellkite Courser enters the battlefield, you may put a commander you own from the command zone onto the battlefield. It gains haste. Return it to the command zone at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [cmr] Temur Battle Rage
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

Ferocious — That creature also gains trample until end of turn if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

item.title: [cmr] Soulfire Eruption
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose any amount of target creatures, planeswalkers, and/or players. For each of them, exile the top card of your library, then Soulfire Eruption deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to that permanent or player.. You may play the exiled cards until the end of your next turn.

https://www.tvmovie.de/news/magic-the-gathering-4-exklusive-preview-karten-aus-commander-legends-115162

item.title: [cmr] Phyrexian Triniform
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

When Phyrexian Triniform dies, create three 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens.

Encore {12} ({12}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [cmr] Path of Ancestry
item.description:
Land

Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1.

item.title: [cmr] Command Beacon
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}, Sacrifice Command Beacon: Put your commander into your hand from the command zone.

item.title: [cmr] Akroma, Vision of Ixidor
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Angel

Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample

At the beginning of each combat, until end of turn, each other creature you control gets +1/+1 if it has flying, +1/+1 if it has first strike, and so on for double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, protection, reach, trample, vigilance, and partner.

Partner

item.title: [cmr] Anointer of Valor
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

Whenever a creature attacks, you may pay {3}. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

item.title: [cmr] Armored Skyhunter
item.description:
Creature — Cat Knight

Flying

Whenever Armored Skyhunter attacks, look at the top six cards of your library. You may put an Aura or Equipment card from among them onto the battlefield. If an Equipment is put onto the battlefield this way, you may attach it to a creature you control. Put the rest of those cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [cmr] Welding Sparks
item.description:
Instant

Welding Sparks deals X damage to target creature, where X is 3 plus the number of artifacts you control.

item.title: [cmr] Elvish Visionary
item.description:
Creature — Elf Shaman

When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Ich-Tekik, Salvage Splicer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Artificer

When Ich-Tekik, Salvage Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.

Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Ich-Tekik and a +1/+1 counter on each Golem you control.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

item.title: [cmr] Ingenuity Engine
item.description:
Artifact

Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Return target artifact you control to its owner's hand.

item.title: [cmr] Akroma's Will
item.description:
Instant

Choose one. If you control a commander as you cast this spell, you may choose both.

• Creatures you control gain flying, vigilance, and double strike until end of turn.

• Creatures you control gain lifelink, indestructible, and protection from all colors until end of turn.

item.title: [cmr] Sakashima of a Thousand Faces
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Rogue

You may have Sakashima of a Thousand Faces enter the battlefield as a copy of another creature you control, except it has Sakashima of a Thousand Faces's other abilities.

The "legend rule" doesn't apply to permanents you control.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
